entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned as being present in the scene, speaking to Minerva McGonagall.

entities.name: minerva mcgonagall
entities.description: Minerva McGonagall is a teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. She is mentioned as being present in the scene, speaking to Dumbledore.

entities.name: alastor moody
entities.description: Alastor Moody is an Auror and a member of the Order of the Phoenix. He is mentioned as being impersonated by someone else in the scene.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main protagonist of the story. He is mentioned as being present in the scene, speaking to Dumbledore and McGonagall.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is speaking to Minerva McGonagall in the scene.
The person impersonating Alastor Moody is being referred to as 'This is not Alastor Moody' by Dumbledore.
Dumbledore is speaking to Harry Potter in the scene.
